## Diagrams

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column}
You can use [mermaid](https://github.com/mermaid-js/mermaid) to create diagrams. 

Here's the first example from Mermaid's website. The diagrams in previous sections were created with mermaid.

```mermaid
flowchart TD

A[Hard] -->|Text| B(Round)
B --> C{Decision}
C -->|One| D[Result 1]
C -->|Two| E[Result 2]
```

:::
